markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=1577)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Subtle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=522" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 339 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=325), [Erecura](/Deities.aspx?ID=564), [Fortune's Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=378), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=462), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=313), [Ng](/Deities.aspx?ID=458), [Nivi Rhombodazzle](/Deities.aspx?ID=354), [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=289), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=619), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [The Tides of Chaos](/Deities.aspx?ID=698), [Yaezhing](/Deities.aspx?ID=318), [Zugero](/Deities.aspx?ID=509)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

Illusions bend light around the target, rendering it [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26). This makes it [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to them instead. If the target uses a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300), the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

---
**Heightened (4th)** The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
name: Invisibility

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Subtle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=522" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 339 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=325), [Erecura](/Deities.aspx?ID=564), [Fortune's Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=378), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=462), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=313), [Ng](/Deities.aspx?ID=458), [Nivi Rhombodazzle](/Deities.aspx?ID=354), [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=289), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=619), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [The Tides of Chaos](/Deities.aspx?ID=698), [Yaezhing](/Deities.aspx?ID=318), [Zugero](/Deities.aspx?ID=509)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
A creature can't be seen until it attacks.
</summary>
summary: A creature can't be seen until it attacks.
summary_markdown: A creature can't be seen until it attacks.
text: Invisibility Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 339 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Achaekek, Erecura, Fortune's Fate, Ketephys, Nalinivati, Ng, Nivi Rhombodazzle, Norgorber, Raumya, Shax, The Tides of Chaos, Yaezhing, Zugero Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 10 minutes --- Illusions bend light around the target, rendering it invisible. This makes it undetected to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it hidden to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed. --- Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
